eu_initiatives: GME operates Italian power, gas and environmental markets and it has been nominated NEMO for the day ahead and intraday markets in Italy following the approval of the EU Regulation 1222/2015 (CACM). Thus GME is involved in EU activities related to the implementation of CACM regulation and furthermore in other projects aimed at achieving the integrated European electricity market.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
